snippet: A United Nations human rights envoy visiting Myanmar said that a confrontation he had with a mob made him empathize with victims of the country’s deadly sectarian violence.
abstract: United Nations human rights envoy visiting Myanmar says that confrontation he had with mob made him empathize with victims of the country’s deadly sectarian violence between Buddhists and Muslims.
lead_paragraph: A United Nations human rights envoy visiting Myanmar said that a confrontation he had with a mob made him empathize with victims of the country’s deadly sectarian violence.

headline.main: Myanmar: Mob Swarms Car of U.N. Rights Envoy
headline.print_headline: Myanmar: Mob Swarms Car of U.N. Rights Envoy
